name: Walder`s Adventure
description:
Hi ^^ 

My Name is Kiksen01 and this is my first Game ever hehe its just a simple fun Adventure Game which isnt amazing hehe pls dont flame me. Its currently on German but i will make a English version of it and i keep working on it to make it better. You can play the Game for free. I just began learning how to program but i will put much better games out soon it would be amazing if You Play my Game (: Enjoy it and please dont rage too much ^^ It is a difficult game and maybe some of you think its impossible! Prove Them Wrong!
